TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AssemblyCompanyAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Defines a company name custom attribute for an assembly manifest.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to apply attributes, including the AssemblyCompanyAttribute attribute, to a dynamic assembly. The example saves the assembly to disk, and the attribute value can be viewed by using the **Windows File Properties** dialog.
[!CODE [AssemblyBuilder_DefineVersionInfoResource#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilder_DefineVersionInfoResource#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string company) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute"> class.

Docs.value: A string containing the company name.
